p: On the other hand, Salmonella enterica was the most susceptible to oregano extract (0.078 mg/mL MIC and 1.25 mg/mL MBC). MIC and MBC assays using 0–20 µg/mL of kanamycin were carried out as a positive control for each bacterium ( Table 3). Bacteria inoculated in nutrient broth with no-extract was used as a negative control to observe microbial growth.
